reviewText: I swooned, I was moved, I laughed out loud and I cried! I haven't been this affected by a movie in a long time. DEFINITELY one of my top ten all time faves now!

I saw this on a Delta flight to Hawaii of all places. Hands down my favorite film this year. I couldn't help it, I laughed out loud at points, and almost had tears at other times during the movie. Have high hopes it will arrive in the US or at least be available on Netflix soon. A perfect buddy film to make you feel good.

I watch a lot of movies, and even though this year 2016 has not had very many good movies come out, this movie is one of the best I have seen in a long time. This was a real hidden gem. You will laugh, and you will cry, but in the end you will thank me for highly recommending this movie!! Well done! Loved it!
